markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Grippli Greenspeaker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=449)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The unofficial healers of gripplikind are known as greenspeakers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Grippli Greenspeaker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=449)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 87</row>

**Perception** +13; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Grippli](/Languages.aspx?ID=48)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +10, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Green Empathy** The greenspeaker can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to Make an Impression on and make very simple Requests of plants and fungi.

**Items**
[Dart](/Weapons.aspx?ID=68) (4), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 71

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +11 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dart +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 23, attack +13
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167), [Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215), [Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)
- **2nd**
[Barkskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)
- **3rd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=10), [Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=325)

**Jungle Stride**   A grippli ignores difficult terrain in forests and jungles.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-110" />
name: Grippli Greenspeaker

text: Grippli Greenspeaker The unofficial healers of gripplikind are known as greenspeakers. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 20 Unspecific Lore : DC 18 Specific Lore : DC 15 Grippli Greenspeaker Source Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders pg. 87 Perception +13; darkvision Languages Common, Grippli Skills Acrobatics +11, Athletics +9, Diplomacy +10, Medicine +11, Nature +14, Religion +11, Stealth +11, Survival +11 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +1 Wis +4 Cha +0 Green Empathy The greenspeaker can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on and make very simple Requests of plants and fungi. Items Dart (4), Staff --- AC 21 Fort +10 Ref +13 Will +13 HP 71 --- Speed 25 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action staff +11 (two-hand d8), Damage 1d4+4 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action dart +13 (Agile, thrown 20 feet), Damage 1d4+4 piercing Primal Prepared Spells DC 23, attack +13 - Cantrips (3rd) Acid Splash, Guidance, Know Direction, Produce Flame, Tanglefoot - 1st Jump, Pass Without Trace, Shillelagh - 2nd Barkskin, Entangle, Speak with Animals - 3rd Animal Form, Summon Plant or Fungus Jungle Stride A grippli ignores difficult terrain in forests and jungles.
